sys_ui_page.html:
var orderLineItem = RP.getParameterValue('sysparm_order_line_item') + ''; var odrline = new GlideRecord('sn_ind_tmt_orm_order_line_item'); odrline.addQuery("sys_id", orderLineItem); odrline.query(); while(odrline.next()) { odrline.getDisplayValue('order'); } //add short desc var serviceOrders = new GlideRecord("sn_ind_tmt_orm_service_order"); serviceOrders.addEncodedQuery("top_order_line_item=" + odrline.sys_id); serviceOrders.orderBy("number"); serviceOrders.query(); var orders = []; while(serviceOrders.next()) { var order = {}; order.num = serviceOrders.number.toString(); order.value = serviceOrders.sys_id.toString(); order.tip = serviceOrders.short_description.toString(); orders.push(order); } orders; var serviceOrderExist = new GlideRecord("sn_ind_tmt_orm_service_order"); serviceOrderExist.addEncodedQuery("top_order_line_item=" + odrline.sys_id); serviceOrderExist.orderBy("number"); serviceOrderExist.query(); if(serviceOrderExist.hasNext()) { true; } else { false; }
